title: Lexicographic order topology on the unit square
summary: In general topology, the lexicographic ordering on the unit square (sometimes the dictionary order on the unit square[1]) is a topology on the unit square S, i.e. on the set of points (x,y) in the plane such that 0 ≤ x ≤ 1 and 0 ≤ y ≤ 1.[2]
